Dreadplague frowned and signify the insignificance of the identity.

Dreadplague: Whatever! We have to finish the gun, and link up the 
reactors!

She went and blew up a third small space in the rock in order to 
place the last reactor.

Dread: We don't have time to wait for the Maxies. Let's just get it 
done with.
